Changes for ks.lib
=========================

1.0.6 - 29 oct 2008
-------------------

- fixes in ks.lib.mailtemplate HTMLParser - removed [1] for links in text/plain emails

1.0.5 - 28 oct 2008
-------------------

- added checks for empty mail header/footer in mailtemplates

1.0.4 - 27 oct 2008
-------------------

- tabs ident bug fixed

1.0.3 - 23 oct 2008
-------------------

- mailtemplate multipart header bug fixed

1.0.2 - 21 oct 2008
-------------------

- mailtemplate attachment functionality added

0.1.0 (unreleased)
-------------------

- Initial code commit
